item.description:
Hello Everyone,

My name is Gene Ang and I facilitate the Meditation and Healing night. A few words about the meditation. It is called Twin Hearts and it is an act of service where the group blesses the world and all the troubled spots with loving kindness and positive energy. In the process, each person also benefits because the energy comes through them. Afterwards, 20 minute Pranic Healing sessions are available ($25) for physical, emotional, or mental dis-ease. If you are interested in a healing and want to pre-arrange something beforehand, please feel free to contact me at gene.ang@gmail.com or (203) 671-8047.

Warm Regards,

Gene
item.name: The Energy Healing Meetup
